Label: Storyline
Value: Everything Michael DeVeaux II ever wanted was so close, yet, so far away. His life was idyllic, relaxed, and mostly beautiful. He had his wife, his mistresses, his money, his mansion, his music, and his collection of contemporary art. But, he also had a love/hate relationship with a dead musical genius who was his idol. But, when a buried family secret reveals itself, he discovers that the things that he thought were important, are not important at all.

Label: Cast
Value: Anzu Lawson, Macee Binns, Tatiana DeKhtyar, Escalante Lundy, Bill Porter
